document.full_text: egypt approved a law on wednesday easing curbs that choked political life under deposed president hosni mubarak, opening the door for the formation of new parties that will compete in elections this year.
document.title: egypt lifts curbs on politics in post-mubarak era
lines_and_colors: egypt approved a law on wednesday easing curbs that choked political life under deposed president hosni mubarak, opening the door for the formation of new parties that will compete in elections this year.
